title: Lock up
content: If you unstake from a project you will enter a 90 day lock up period. During this time you will continue to receive NXM rewards (but not shield mining incentive rewards) and can still lose some (or all) of your deposit if a successful claim is made.

title: Risks
content: When staking NXM, you are exposing yourself to risk. If a claim is paid on a project you staked on, you could lose your deposit.

title: Shield mining rewards
content: Shield mining rewards from incentivized projects must be claimed manually from the staking rewards dashboard on a weekly basis and they don't roll over from one week to the next.
